pull.title: Walletload
pull.body:
Calculates a hash to accelerate key import.

Enables skipping EC_KEY_check_key when a hash is present.

Benchmarks show 0.15ms per key vs 1.5ms per key.

An order of magnitude improvement.

events.message:
improve wallet load time by removing duplicated calls to EC_KEY_check_key and adding a hash for vchPubKey/vchPrivKey entries in wallet.dat

backwards compatible with previous wallet.dat format
verify vchPubKey matches calculated public key unless fSkipCheck is set

events.body: Cool. This is interesting because on a wallet with lots of keys the initial startup is shockingly slow.

events.message: comment explaining new wallet format for key/wkey entries

events.body:

ACK. Tested loading old wallets with the new code, and loading new wallets with the old code, all was good.
